name: Posts/Pages Admin Renamer
author: Lawson Kurtz

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to change the words “Posts” and “Pages” in the admin
interface to anything you’d like. Plural inflection is currently not
supported… sorry… no geese or boxes for you! Choose your new term in the
“Rename Posts/Pages” panel. This plugin requires PHP 5.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the postpage-admin-renamer directory to the /wp-content/plugins/
    directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Fixed potential conflict with other plugins.

1.0

  • Initial launch.

short_description: Allows a user to change the words "Posts" and "Pages" in the admin interface.
